CRM is very reasonably priced for startups, backed by a strong player in the market Vyapaar, I was very skeptical in going ahead with them as I had my doubts in terms of reports extra, and the price per annum was too good to be true, hence took time to understanding the app, as  this is one of the most important applications for any organization who has a team for tele calling, their UI is very simple, I hardly found any bugs in the system, and whenever I pointed it to the team who were behind the show, they quickly worked on the same based on their priorities. the backend engineers and developers are doing a great job, manier times the sales team has helped me with technical queries I was surprised with the product and process knowledge the team has, I have earlier used CRM such as SalesForce, Zoho, Leadsquare etc and so far find this app has the potential to grow as big as them and hoping they continue with their impeccable service. All the very best to the entire team. started using the application and I am quite happy with it.
The main features are that we can get real time leads and notifications from different platforms like Facebook, Justdial, Magic bricks and many other platforms.
- You will get Proper notifications  and  Follow up.
- User interface is very smooth and easy.
- Next Level support from the Team.

Still there are some improvements which are neede but overall It's a highly efficient system with a solid base of useful features.

								<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
														</span>
												<a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">What is telecalling CRM?</a>
					</div>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-4721" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix elementor-active" data-tab="1" role="region" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-4721" style="display: block;">A telecalling CRM makes your telecalling process seamless by increasing productivity and boosting sales. It helps you in consolidating and automating manual tasks. It also provides you with real-time agent reports to monitor your agents’ performance. NeoDove is the perfect telecalling CRM for all your telecalling activities.</div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<div id="elementor-tab-title-4722" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="2" role="button" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-4722" aria-expanded="false">
													<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
															<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
								<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
														</span>
												<a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">How is it different from normal CRM?</a>
					</div>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-4722" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="2" role="region" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-4722">A normal CRM doesn’t specifically target your telecalling team’s activities. It’s overall aim is to make your business workflow more organized, whereas a telecalling CRM particularly helps telecalling agents to have a hassle-free calling experience, improve their productivity, and provides your customers the best experience.</div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<div id="elementor-tab-title-4723" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="3" role="button" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-4723" aria-expanded="false">
													<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
															<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
								<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
														</span>
												<a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">How to manage your telesales activities through NeoDove?</a>
					</div>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-4723" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="3" role="region" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-4723">You can implement outbound calling campaigns and manage your other telesales activities seamlessly using NeoDove. Convert prospects into customers using tele-reach activities such as campaigns, SMS automation, and prospect communication through multiple channels that enhance your sales process.</div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<div id="elementor-tab-title-4724" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="4" role="button" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-4724" aria-expanded="false">
													<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
															<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
								<span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened"><svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewBox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z"></path></svg></span>
														</span>
												<a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">How can you use NeoDove as a sales engagement tool?</a>
					</div>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-4724" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="4" role="region" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-4724"><p>Use NeoDove as a&nbsp;<a href="https://neodove.com/sales-engagement/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">sales engagement</a>&nbsp;tool to engage with your prospects and customers across multiple channels. Use it for lead management, customer interaction, contact management, and more. Streamline your workflow with automation and&nbsp;<a href="https://neodove.com/integration-platforms/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">multi-platform integration</a>.</p></div>

					<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){
    $('#float-bottom-btn').hide();
    $(window).scroll(function() {
        if ($(this).scrollTop() > 100) {
            $('#float-bottom-btn').fadeIn();
        } else {
            $('#float-bottom-btn').fadeOut();
        }
    });
});

<script>
	function copyToClipboard(element) {
  var $temp = $("<input>");
  $("body").append($temp);
  $temp.val($(element).text()).select();
  document.execCommand("copy");
  $temp.remove();
}
</script>

<script>
	function nothanks() {
		var nothks = document.querySelector(".sgpb-content-61192");
		nothks.classList.toggle('solutionpopup');
		var nothksoveray = document.querySelector(".sgpb-popup-overlay-61192");
		nothksoveray.classList.toggle('solutionpopup');
	}
	document.querySelector('.Solution-Popup-bt a').addEventListener('click', function () {
		var rmclad = document.querySelector(".sgpb-content-61192");
		rmclad.classList.remove('solutionpopup');
		var ddsoveray = document.querySelector(".sgpb-popup-overlay-61192");
		ddsoveray.classList.remove('solutionpopup');

	});
	
	
	document.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
    if (window.scrollY > 0) { // Change 100 to your desired offset
        document.getElementById("masthead").classList.add("sticky-header");
    } else {
        document.getElementById("masthead").classList.remove("sticky-header");
    }
});
</script>

 			// By default keeps button enabled
 // 			document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = false;
			
 			// Variable declaration for event listner
 			var disableCfBtnListner;
 			var disableAllPageCfBtnListner;
			var disableCfBtnOneListner; 
			
 			/// Timeout function to wait for html load complete before initializing the variable
 			setTimeout(()=> {
 				// Select element to listen
 				disableCfBtnListner = document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom");
 				disableAllPageCfBtnListner = document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled");
				disableCfBtnOneListner = document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one");
			
 				// attach event listner to click event
 				disableCfBtnListner.addEventListener("click", disableSubBtn);
 				disableAllPageCfBtnListner.addEventListener("click", disableAllPageSubBtn);
				disableCfBtnOneListner.addEventListener("click", disableOneSubBtn);
 			},3000);
			
 			// Function to be called for disabling the button
 			function disableSubBtn() {
//  				console.log("Disable called");
 				// Timeout setup so that cf function gets executed before disabling the button
 				setTimeout(() => {
 						   document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = true;
 						   }, 50);
 			}
			 
			 function disableAllPageSubBtn() {
 				// Timeout setup so that cf function gets executed before disabling the button
 				setTimeout(() => {
 						   document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled").disabled = true;
 						   }, 50);
 			}
			 
			 function disableOneSubBtn() {
 				// Timeout setup so that cf function gets executed before disabling the button
 				setTimeout(() => {
 						   document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one").disabled = true;
 						   }, 50);
 			}

 			// Reenable button in case if form is invalid
 			document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7invalid', function( event ) {
 				setTimeout(()=> {
 					document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = false;
					document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled").disabled = false;
					document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one").disabled = false;
 				},500);
 			}, false );
		
 			// Reenable button in case if form is filled for spam
 			document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7spam', function( event ) {
 			  setTimeout(()=> {
 					document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one").disabled = false;
 				},500);
 			}, false );
		
 			// Reenable button in case if mail is sent
 			document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7mailsent', function( event ) {
 			  setTimeout(()=> {
 					document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one").disabled = false;
 				},2000);
			}, false );
			
 			//Reenable button in case if mail is not sent
 			document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7mailfailed', function( event ) {
			  setTimeout(()=> {
 					document.getElementById("cf-disable-homeBottom").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_all_page_disabled").disabled = false;
				  	document.getElementById("cf_btn_disable_one").disabled = false;
 				},500);
 			}, false );
         </script>
     		
					<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

            <script type="text/javascript">
                
                window.addEventListener('elementor/popup/show', function (e) {
                    var ffForms = jQuery('#elementor-popup-modal-' + e.detail.id).find('form.frm-fluent-form');

                    /**
                     * Support conversation form in elementor popup
                     * No regular form found, check for conversational form
                     */
                    if (!ffForms.length) {
                        const elements = document.getElementsByClassName('ffc_conv_form');
                        if (elements.length) {
                            let jsEvent = new CustomEvent('ff-elm-conv-form-event', {
                                detail: elements
                            });
                            document.dispatchEvent(jsEvent);
                        }
                    }
                    if (ffForms.length) {
                        jQuery.each(ffForms, function(index, ffForm) {
                            jQuery(ffForm).trigger('reInitExtras');
                            jQuery(document).trigger('ff_reinit', [ffForm]);
                        });
                    }
                });

                        <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
                    function initTelInput() {
                        if (typeof intlTelInput == 'undefined') {
                            return;
                        }
                        var telInput = jQuery('.ff_form_instance_55_2').find("#ff_55_2_phonenumber");
                        if (!telInput.length) {
                            return;
                        }

                        var itlOptions = JSON.parse('{"separateDialCode":false,"nationalMode":true,"autoPlaceholder":"polite","formatOnDisplay":true,"initialCountry":"IN"}');
                                                var iti = intlTelInput(telInput[0], itlOptions);
                        if (telInput.val()) {
                            iti.setNumber(telInput.val());
                            iti.d.autoPlaceholder = 'polite';
                        }
                        telInput.on("keyup change", function () {
                            if (typeof intlTelInputUtils !== 'undefined') { // utils are lazy loaded, so must check
                                var currentText = iti.getNumber(intlTelInputUtils.numberFormat.E164);
                                if (iti.isValidNumber() && typeof currentText === 'string') { // sometimes the currentText is an object :)
                                    iti.setNumber(currentText); // will autoformat because of formatOnDisplay=true
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }

                    initTelInput();
                    $(document).on('reInitExtras', '.ff_form_instance_55_2', function () {
                        initTelInput();
                    });
                });
            </script>
                        <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
                    function initTelInput() {
                        if (typeof intlTelInput == 'undefined') {
                            return;
                        }
                        var telInput = jQuery('.ff_form_instance_41_3').find("#ff_41_3_phonenumber");
                        if (!telInput.length) {
                            return;
                        }

                        var itlOptions = JSON.parse('{"separateDialCode":false,"nationalMode":true,"autoPlaceholder":"polite","formatOnDisplay":true,"initialCountry":"IN"}');
                                                var iti = intlTelInput(telInput[0], itlOptions);
                        if (telInput.val()) {
                            iti.setNumber(telInput.val());
                            iti.d.autoPlaceholder = 'polite';
                        }
                        telInput.on("keyup change", function () {
                            if (typeof intlTelInputUtils !== 'undefined') { // utils are lazy loaded, so must check
                                var currentText = iti.getNumber(intlTelInputUtils.numberFormat.E164);
                                if (iti.isValidNumber() && typeof currentText === 'string') { // sometimes the currentText is an object :)
                                    iti.setNumber(currentText); // will autoformat because of formatOnDisplay=true
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }

                    initTelInput();
                    $(document).on('reInitExtras', '.ff_form_instance_41_3', function () {
                        initTelInput();
                    });
                });
            </script>
                        <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
                    function initTelInput() {
                        if (typeof intlTelInput == 'undefined') {
                            return;
                        }
                        var telInput = jQuery('.ff_form_instance_41_4').find("#ff_41_4_phonenumber");
                        if (!telInput.length) {
                            return;
                        }

                        var itlOptions = JSON.parse('{"separateDialCode":false,"nationalMode":true,"autoPlaceholder":"polite","formatOnDisplay":true,"initialCountry":"IN"}');
                                                var iti = intlTelInput(telInput[0], itlOptions);
                        if (telInput.val()) {
                            iti.setNumber(telInput.val());
                            iti.d.autoPlaceholder = 'polite';
                        }
                        telInput.on("keyup change", function () {
                            if (typeof intlTelInputUtils !== 'undefined') { // utils are lazy loaded, so must check
                                var currentText = iti.getNumber(intlTelInputUtils.numberFormat.E164);
                                if (iti.isValidNumber() && typeof currentText === 'string') { // sometimes the currentText is an object :)
                                    iti.setNumber(currentText); // will autoformat because of formatOnDisplay=true
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }

                    initTelInput();
                    $(document).on('reInitExtras', '.ff_form_instance_41_4', function () {
                        initTelInput();
                    });
                });
            </script>

if(is_iframe){iframe_count+=1}}});if(image_count>0||iframe_count>0||rocketlazy_count>0){lazyLoadInstance.update()}});var b=document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];var config={childList:!0,subtree:!0};observer.observe(b,config)}},!1)</script><script data-no-minify="1" async="" src="https://neodove.com/wp-content/plugins/wp-rocket/assets/js/lazyload/17.8.3/lazyload.min.js"></script><script>function lazyLoadThumb(e,alt,l){var t='<img data-lazy-src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"><noscript><img src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"></noscript>',a='<button class="play" aria-label="Play Youtube video"></button>';if(l){t=t.replace('data-lazy-','');t=t.replace('loading="lazy"','');t=t.replace(/<noscript>.*?<\/noscript>/g,'');}t=t.replace('alt=""','alt="'+alt+'"');return t.replace("ID",e)+a}function lazyLoadYoutubeIframe(){var e=document.createElement("iframe"),t="ID?autoplay=1";t+=0===this.parentNode.dataset.query.length?"":"&"+this.parentNode.dataset.query;e.setAttribute("src",t.replace("ID",this.parentNode.dataset.src)),e.setAttribute("frameborder","0"),e.setAttribute("allowfullscreen","1"),e.setAttribute("allow","accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"),this.parentNode.parentNode.replaceChild(e,this.parentNode)}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){var exclusions=[];var e,t,p,u,l,a=document.getElementsByClassName("rll-youtube-player");for(t=0;t<a.length;t++)(e=document.createElement("div")),(u='https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg'),(u=u.replace('ID',a[t].dataset.id)),(l=exclusions.some(exclusion=>u.includes(exclusion))),e.setAttribute("data-id",a[t].dataset.id),e.setAttribute("data-query",a[t].dataset.query),e.setAttribute("data-src",a[t].dataset.src),(e.innerHTML=lazyLoadThumb(a[t].dataset.id,a[t].dataset.alt,l)),a[t].appendChild(e),(p=e.querySelector(".play")),(p.onclick=lazyLoadYoutubeIframe)});</script>
